summary: De Wallen, Amsterdam's famous red-light district, is a top tourist spot. It's known for legal prostitution and marijuana shops. A red-light district is an area with lots of sex-related businesses, like strip clubs and adult theaters. These places are often linked to street prostitution, and some cities also have male prostitution and gay venues in these districts. Many big cities worldwide have well-known red-light areas.
title: Red-light district
